ygData.subject: Re: Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: hi terence, heres the advice... EM is way over crowded and the econ there is all screwed up... and since u havent go far in the game... its still not too late
ygData.messageBody:
hi terence,
heres the advice... EM is way over crowded and the econ there is all screwed
up... and since u havent go far in the game... its still not too late to
shift... u could either shift to...
Innoruuk - where most of the SG folks are...
Prexus - where some SG folks are...
The Tribunal - this is the newest server where nothing there is messed up...

just my 2cp
Nic
----- Original Message -----
From: Terence Tan Kar Chuan <karchuan@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 6:20 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Introduction


> From: "Terence Tan Kar Chuan" <karchuan@...>
>
> I bought the game and don't know where to start so I just randomly choose
a
> server. It just happen to be EM. I will check out Innoruuk server one of
> these days and when I do so, I will look for u guys. Don't have much time
to
> start another character nowadays. Got to work, take care of my girlfriend
> and my family. Wish I could be like your Enchanter friend.
>
> In the mean time, I will try to frequent this mailing list.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 2:59 PM
> Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Introduction
>
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > 95% of us play in Innoruuk server. One chao-ah-aqua got a lvl 49
> enchanter
> > in CT server but he still managed to train a lvl 20 plus cleric & a lvl
20
> > plus bard in Innoruuk in a short time. Why? Becoz all kakis very close
> and
> > helpful. We even intend to start a SG guild and accept mainly local
kakis
> > and those trust-worthy friends from other nations. We also got a big
rich
> > guy in Innoruuk who can extend any financial loan service to you. ;-P
> >
> > How come u are still in EM server???
> >
> > Ziltus Planeswalker
>
>
